Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Interface GroupDAO

All Superinterfaces:
DAO<Group,Long>
public interface GroupDAO extends DAO<Group,Long>
This interface defines methods to interact with groups and group related tasks.
